original_title: A Dandy and a Clown: The Life of Jon Pertwee
overview: This exclusive documentary looks at the life and career of Jon Pertwee. With contributions from actors Katy Manning, Judy Cornwell, David Jacobs, Geoffrey Bayldon and Kenneth Earle, Doctor Who writer and script editor Terrance Dicks and long-time friend Stuart Money.
title: A Dandy and a Clown: The Life of Jon Pertwee
